events.value: Dwight's sworn enemy can be reset unless Rhadin is killed before that time.

nextSession.title: Chapter 45 - The Castle Gates
nextSession.description: It is clear to the group now that no matter hard one might try, Strahd will always find a way to destroy everything in Barovia. You have only had a taste of the destruction misery that he has caused, the people of Barovia live in a perpetual nightmare. Armed with anger, vengeance and justice, you approach the gates of Castle Ravenloft, the home of Strahd von Zarovich to free everyone from his nightmare.

events.value: Firewatch's nightmares from the Mystery Mine will fade.

nextSession.title: Chapter 17 - Stepping Into Prismeer
nextSession.description: Mister Light and Mister Witch are furious with everyone, you have stolen his precious watch, and he wants it back. You need answers, and you need to find a way into Prismeer to save Zybilna.
